description: Charlie Barker's own goal in the ninth minute of stoppage-time completed a remarkable turnaround for Bolton as they came from behind to beat Crawley 4-3.
title: Bolton Wanderers 4-3 Crawley Town
title_page: Bolton Wanderers 4-3 Crawley Town: Schumacher claims first win in dramatic style - BBC Sport
maintext:
Bolton Wanderers have won each of their last two league games against Crawley Town, though both of those victories have come away from home.
Crawley Town have failed to win any of their last eight league games against sides from Greater Manchester (D4 L4), since a 2-0 victory over Rochdale in March 2023.
Bolton have only failed to score in one of their last ten league games, although that blank did come in their most recent match during a 1-0 defeat to Reading.
Crawley have won just one of their last nine league games (D2 L6), but that sole victory did come in their last outing on the road in a 1-0 win at Mansfield.
